attributes.action: Parliament to insist upon its sole right to decide upon triggering Article 50
attributes.background: We the undersigned believe that only Parliament can properly make the decision as to when and whether the UK should trigger Article 50, involving giving notice to the EU of an intention to leave it. This is not a decision that is appropriate for the government alone.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
